ruleChapterName: tag.a@text@js:result.replace(/(【|［|（|\(|\[|\{).{0,15}(章|更|合|票|赏|盟|歉|谢|祝|节|新|年).+/,"").replace(/^\S+ (\d{3,4})\s/,"第$1章 ").replace(/^\S+ 第(\d{3,4}|[零一二三四五六七八九十百千]{1,7})章/,"第$1章")
ruleFindUrl:
<js>
a=["1","玄幻奇幻","2","武侠修真","3","都市生活","4","军事战争","5","历史穿越","6","游戏竞技","7","科幻未来","8","悬疑灵异","9","古代言情","10","现代言情","11","青春校园","12","幻想言情","13","仙侠奇缘","14","二次元"];
x="";
for (var i=0;i<a.length/2;i++)
{
y=2*i;
z=2*i+1;
x=x + a[z] +"::/library/0_" + a[y] + "_0_1.html&&";
}
result=x;
String(result);
</js>
ruleSearchLastChapter: class.chapter@text@js:result.replace("最新章节：","").replace(/(【|［|（|\(|\[|\{).{0,15}(章|更|合|票|赏|盟|歉|谢|祝|节|新|年).+/,"").replace(/^\S+ (\d{3,4})\s/,"第$1章 ").replace(/^\S+ 第(\d{3,4}|[零一二三四五六七八九十百千]{1,7})章/,"第$1章")

ruleBookContent:
result=JSON.parse(result).data.comments.map(a=>"用户："+a.createrId.userName+"
评分："+a.score+" / 5"+"
时间："+a.createdAt.replace(/T.+/,"")+"
评语："+a.content.replace(/([。！？；]+[）”]?)/g,"$1\n").replace(/([0-9a-zA-Z\u4e00-\u9fa5])$/,"$1……")+"
该评价的点赞数："+a.praiseCount).join("
——
");
ruleFindUrl:
<js>
/**
自定义数组 n 中的数字，加载1份或多份书单。
1到5，分别对应5大类书单；从6开始，则精选了几位书单大佬的书单，即：
1、"所有"；
2、"最新"；
3、"精品"；
4、"男频"；
5、"女频"；
6、优书优选；
7、风萤月；
8、赤戟；
9、己未癸酉；
10、天落歌；
11、青山；
12、山猫；
13、厂长。
**/
n=[3,8];
m=["all","newest","essence","man","women",788682,756653,333316,888741,402302,698727,27857,560124];
u1="::/api/booklist/";
u2="?page=searchPage&&";
w1="http://www.yousuu.com/api/booklists?page=1&type=";
w2="http://www.yousuu.com/api/user/";
w3="/booklistDetail?page=1";
result="";
function wy (n){
n<6?www=w1+m[n-1]:www=w2+m[n-1]+w3;
tmp=java.ajax(www);
blist=JSON.parse(tmp).data.booklists.map(a=>"["+a.bookTotal+"] "+a.title.replace(/[^ 0-9a-zA-Z\u4e00-\u9fa5]/g,"")+u1+a.booklistId+u2).join("");return blist}
for (i in n){result+=wy(n[i])}
